identity.title: Calculate average of two integer numbers

content.prompt: Given two integer variables first_num, second_num, write a program that calculates their average.Assume that the initial values of first_num, second_num are set to an integer value. The average of the two numbers should be stored in the variable averageE.g.: If first_num is 3 and second_num is 5, then the average is 4.0If first_num is 4 and second_num is 5, then the average is 4.5Authors: Yana Kortsarts, Yulia Kempner, Leonid Kugel, Kamil Akhuseyinoglu
